text: David Byrne (; born 14 May 1952) is a Scottish-American singer-songwriter, record producer, actor, writer, music theorist, and filmmaker. He was a founding member and performer with the American new wave band Talking Heads. He has received Academy, Grammy, Tony, and Golden Globe Awards. He has also been honored in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame as part of Talking Heads. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American artists Category:American rock guitarists Category:American pop musicians Category:American rock singers Category:American pop singers Category:American record producers Category:Actors from Maryland Category:Musicians from Maryland Category:Singers from Maryland Category:American keyboardists Category:Movie directors from Maryland Category:Movie producers from Maryland Category:Screenwriters from Maryland Category:Tony Award winners Category:Academy Award winning composers Category:American composers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning composers Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:American stage actors Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish singer-songwriters Category:Scottish rock singers Category:Scottish rock musicians Category:Scottish pop musicians Category:Scottish pop singers Category:New wave singers
